segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and I’m just feeling so frustrated by the whole thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, and it’s infuriating how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it’s making me angry that they’re getting away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that stool, and it’s like he’s asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, and it’s annoying how passive she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how no one is doing anything about the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a mess, and it’s making me so mad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting ruined, and it’s all so unnecessary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just take control of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is all just so frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
